professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in database management, Salesforce automation, and data integration. Proven track record in managing complex databases, ensuring data accuracy, and integrating third-party applications.

key_responsibilities: Managing Oracle 12c and SQL Server databases for enterprise applications.
Optimizing database performance and ensuring data integrity.
Developing ETL processes and data migration strategies.
Configuring Salesforce for constituent management and donor tracking.
Implementing data validation rules and workflows.
Managing integrations with third-party applications like Apsona and MailChimp.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Public Health
Associate of Arts in General Studies
